messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: Following up from today's site visit for Store-202 - the electrical panel issue Tom identified is going to need immediate attention in our cost estimate.

messages.author: Tom Wilson
messages.text: Agreed. I'm updating the estimate now with the $35K electrical upgrade. Also documenting the landlord vendor restriction we discovered.

threads.summary: Follow-up on site visit findings. Cost estimate updated with electrical upgrade and landlord constraint documented.

messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: Following up from today's site visit for Store-202 - the electrical panel issue Tom identified is going to need immediate attention in our cost estimate.

messages.author: Tom Wilson
messages.text: Agreed. I'm updating the estimate now with the $35K electrical upgrade. Also documenting the landlord vendor restriction we discovered.

messages.author: Jennifer Liu
messages.text: Thanks Sarah. Mike, can you send over the store traffic data so we can schedule the electrical work during lowest impact periods?

messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: Will do - sending that over by end of day.

messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: FYI - Store #Store-236 came in $15K under budget on electrical work. Worth understanding what drove that variance.

messages.author: Tom Wilson
messages.text: We used the backup vendor TempMaster who had better pricing than our usual contractor. Quality was good, no issues.

messages.author: Jennifer Liu
messages.text: Interesting. Is TempMaster someone we should add to our primary vendor rotation?

messages.author: Mike Rodriguez
messages.text: I'd recommend it. They were responsive, delivered on time, and pricing was 12% lower than our standard rate.

messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: Let me reach out to them about establishing a preferred vendor relationship. Could generate savings across our portfolio.

threads.summary: Discussed cost variance on completed store. Identified backup vendor with better pricing for potential preferred vendor status.
